title: Being wrongly accused of third party content
body:
I was emailed today by Riot Games, telling me that I am using third party content that I am completely unaware of.
I dont like the act of cheating, nor the idea of active cheaters amongst the League of Legends Community.
Even my friend asked if I have ever tried scripting of any kind, to which is an obvious answer. As this email came as a surprise to me.
Only playing two or three games yesterday.
I sent a ticket to Riot Games telling them as much as I could and even suggesting that someone might have played my account via hack or something.
As nobody i know has access to my account except me, I have no reason to believe its anything else.
Sure enough I get the obligatory email saying that Riot Games is going to process my request, which is comforting.
To get an email saying what I have done is against League of legends ToS, when I havent done anything, as I am being WRONGLY ACCUSED of something i have no FREAKING KNOWLEDGE OF?!
I could completely understand a warning/permaban if i was guilty, but a permaban for something i literally didnt do is a bit out of hand.

I am confused to the point of anger, and rightfully so.
If any RIOT Team can help i dont understand how i can use third party content when i live by the idea of not cheating, as i have a sense of pride in my League of Legends account regardless of my crappy B5 rank.

replies.body: Same thing is happening to me! Wtf riot!

Hey there,

As you've already stated in your post that you've submitted a ticket then you'll have to wait for a reply there as this is an account-specific inquiry and we on the boards are unable to assist you with this.

Am I seriously meant to sit here and just let my account be permabanned for something i havent done?
I would do whatever i can to prove my innocence but outside of Riot sending me my email they dont say anything.. 
I dont know what else to do..

I dont use any programs though, thats my beef. If i was guilty of third party programs i wouldnt try to get my account back because i lost it for fair reasons.
But I havent even done anything and im permabanned and they refuse to say anything at this point other than what they have told me already.

I remembering this happening back in the day to a couple of mates with apps like MK but if you aren't using something similar to it I would have no Idea man, do you use any programs that affect the game in anyway? If you do just get rid of them as that could be the problem, if not I would have no clue sorry dude.
Good luck man I Hope you get the answer you're looking for!
